architect.title: Architect Cloud
architect.description: This is my first web page started from scratch. It is made in pure HTML and CSS.

games.title: Game Portal
games.description: This is a web page made during the 2nd session implementing a simple login system, a game catalog and a game coded by us.

d&d.title: Dungeon & Dragon
d&d.description: This is a web page displaying different dungeon and dragon characters. Unfortunately, the API is closed by our professor for the moment.

glucose.title: GlucOSE
glucose.description: This is a web application for managing student internships. It is made with Angular and Node.js.

cookbook.title: Cookbook
cookbook.description: This is a web page that I made during the 6th session to catalog recipes and cooking tricks for every user to share and cook.

cpm.title: Crypto Portfolio Manager
cpm.description: Ceci est une application web qui permet de gérer un portefeuille de cryptomonnaie. Ce projet est toujours en cours de développement et très rudimentaire.

home.title: Computer Science Technique
home.description: This page is presented by Louis-Philippe Forget, a computer science student at Cégep André-Laurendeau. You will find information about me, my projects and my progress in programming language.
home.desc: I am Louis-Philippe Forget, a computer science student at Cégep André-Laurendeau. I started this program in August 2021 and I have now finished. I have always loved computer science. Since my high school, I have a tower at home that I assembled myself. During the computer science technique at Cégep André-Laurendeau, I learned several programming languages including C++, C#, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, dart, HTML and CSS. I also learned to use different operating systems including Windows and Linux. I also learned to use different software like Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, IntelliJ, etc. I also learned to use different versioning tools like Git, GitLab and GitHub. I also learned to use different data storage methods like SQL and NoSQL databases.
home.aptitudesDesc: I am a programmer who loves to learn new things and who is able to adapt to new situations. I am also able to work in a team and adapt to new situations.
home.developpementDesc: This is a personal web page. Several projects will be attached to it including the last one I did. This one is a D&D page that uses different APIs to load the characters of a game.
home.designDesc: This page uses the designs of Bootstrap v5. I am not the best in design, but I think I am able to manage well to make an excellent user experience.
home.commandsDesc: In the 420.0B program we use different operating systems and different methods to store data which forces us to learn command lines and requests.
home.projectSecond: I had the chance to do several projects in web programming.
home.projectsDesc: The different sites are here to see my evolution from the first session to the 3rd session. Unfortunately, some sites are not totally completed by the transcription of JavaScript to TypeScript. Also, the API of the Dungeon & Dragon site can be closed by our professor which gives it a much less justified look for the moment.
home.progressDesc: This page is made to show my evolution in web programming. You will find information on the different languages I have learned and the different projects I have done.
home.question: If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us.
home.name: Full name
